analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol#227-229):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol)
needTokens in TokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol#206) is a local variable never initialiazed

TokenCrowdsale.transferToken (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol#216-227) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,needTokens - lockTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol#222-224)
	-token.transferLockedPart(to,lockTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol#226)

TokenCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol#227-229) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/14/0x627285200c02068e3a1a8ded8541f37b1200701f.sol)
